note.p: Daughter of John Brown and his wife Marion Wilson of Durrisdeer, Dumfries, Scotland. Married John Hunter, farmer of Tynron (1795–1858), at Sanquhar, Dumfries, in 1841.
Census returns of Scotland 1851 (The National Archives of Scotland: Tynron 1/2), 1861 (Tynron 1/1), 1871 (Tynron 2/4), 1881 (Tynron 1/5), 1891 (Tynron 1/5)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 August 2019)
Scotland, select births and baptisms, 1564–1950 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 August 2019)
